content: Savings Bank Account General CIMB Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 Oct 2018Does CIMB FastSaver pay interest on a daily basis? For their 1% interest pa.?Hi! I just opened an account with CIMB FastSaver and I'm waiting for my iBanking application to be processed, so I can't really access my account now. Is the interest paid on a daily basis or when is the interest received?2 answersAnswerBump0

WizardAnswered on 11 Oct 2018Yes interest paid daily according to: https://www.cimbbank.com.sg/en/personal/products/accounts/savings-accounts/cimb-fastsaver-account.html​Screenshots: ​​More about it at FAQ:https://www.cimbbank.com.sg/en/personal/products/accounts/savings-accounts/cimb-fastsaver-account/cimb-fastsaver-account-faq.html​​0 comments1
Png Cheng Xi Damien, Happy Life Seeker at HomeLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 11 Oct 2018Monthly basis, but based on daily average balance on your account. 0 comments0
